site.description: ECM Developer is an Eclipse plug-in aimed at supporting the development of applications using FileNet P8 system or CMIS respositories. It approaches the system from a developers point of view and tries to find solutions for day to day tasks. At this moment features include Object Store browsing and searching, a Code Module editor, Class Diagram Editor and Java code generation. This plug-in uses the great 'Silk icon set 1.3' by Mark James at http://www.famfamfam.com/lab/icons/silk/

category-def.name: com.ecmdeveloper.45
category-def.label: ECM Developer Plug-in for CE 4.5 ((not in combination with CE 4.5.1 and beyond)
category-def.description: Make sure you select the correct version for your system. You cannot install both versions within the same eclipse instance.

category-def.name: com.ecmdeveloper
category-def.label: ECM Developer Plug-in for CE 4.5.1 and beyond (not in combination with CE 4.5)
category-def.description: Make sure you select the correct version for your system. You cannot install both versions within the same eclipse instance.
